categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Prior to the battle of Mon Cala, Jedi General Mace Windu dispatched Jedi Master Kit Fisto, Padawan Ahsoka Tano, and Clone Commander Monnk with a company of clone SCUBA troopers to Mon Cala to reinforce the Mon Calamari against an inevitable civil war against the Quarren and the Confederacy of Independent Systems forces led by Riff Tamson. The company consisted of several squadrons, with Monnk serving as Red Leader, and Tano serving as Blue Leader.
